title: Premiere: Vinyl Jacket – Corona
content:
Having made their triumphant return at the Head of Steam in Newcastle at the tail end of last year, Vinyl Jacket explode into 2014 with new track, Corona.

As with their live set, it’s snappy, energetic, intelligent and deviously danceable . This is ready-made for the festival circuit, and yet another indication that these four Geordie lads are set for a hugely exciting year. Stream Corona below, lifted from a forthcoming EP, and grab tickets for their next Newcastle gig on 24 Feb.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
